definition: relating to or of the nature of a legal trust (i.e. the holding of something in trust for another), a person who holds assets in trust for a beneficiary
details:
adjective
- relating to or of the nature of a legal trust (i.e. the holding of something in trust for another)
= example: relating to or of the nature of a legal trust (i.e. the holding of something in trust for another)
= synonyms: fiducial
noun
- a person who holds assets in trust for a beneficiary
= example: a person who holds assets in trust for a beneficiary
